name: vimrc_nopik
description: After quite long usage of vim I&#039ve got quite useful vimrc file. Its newest version can be found at http://www.nopik.of.plRight now it uses all of function keys for easy buffer browsing and compilation (it is tailored for C/C++). There is also few other nice features and keybindings.

versions.release_notes: This upload didn't change since last time, but now comes with short keybinding description on homepage and fixes a number in script version ;)
